entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
